articles.title: In big boost to India`s COVID-19 battle, Hetero`s Tocilizumab biosimilar gets DCGI`s nod - Zee News
articles.description: Drug firm Hetero on Monday (September 6, 2021) announced that it has received emergency use authorisation from the Drug Controller General of India (DCGI) for its biosimilar version of Tocilizumab for treatment of COVID-19 patients.

articles.title: Antibodies decrease by more than 80% six months after second shot of Pfizer vaccine: US study - India Today
articles.description: A US study has revealed that antibodies reduce by more than 80 percent six months after receiving second dose of Pfizer vaccine.
